alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 7:52AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog This Morning... Patchy dense fog has developed early this morning over portions of the Salinas Valley. Visibilities are reduced to around one half mile in general, with localized areas experiencing visibilities of one quarter of a mile or less. Patchy fog should dissipate over the next hour or so. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
